means: 引诱( induce的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: More than 4,000 teachers were induced to take early retirement.
The term electronics refers to electrically-induced action.

list.abs: 英语词根_爱问知识人 ... occur 发生 induce 导致，引起 deduce 演绎.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... deduction n 推论；减法 induce v 劝诱，诱导 inducement n 引诱；劝诱.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... inducement 诱因 inducer 诱导物 inducible system 诱导系统.
医用术语中英文对照表-梁子同志 ... induced electricity 感生电，感应电 inducer 电感器，诱发器 induct 感应，引导，引入.

entry.tran: (与名词连用构成形容词)表示“由…引起的”
entry.def: -induced combines with nouns to form adjectives which indicate that a state, condition, or illness is caused by a particular thing.

means.word_mean: 1. brought about or caused; not spontaneous;
